page.title: 06Saving West Wood.
page.content: West Wood is{ancient woodland managed by Cistercian Monks 1210-1530. Used for site of military instalations (anti-aircraft guns)in World War 2 and then fell into neglect and sold into lots in 1948.Owned by Hants.C.C. Eastleigh Boro.Co. Soton City Co. and sundry private owners it was used for gravel extraction and subsequently rubbish tipping and it became a messy eyesore. In 1981 local residents took interest in its preservation and a group called{"Friends of West Wood" was founded.To date 600 man hours have been spent clearing rubbish (34 old cars)and tree planting etc.Help given by Venture scouts,local schools,Guides and many other groups.Council gave skips,posts,cement etc.and the site is once again becoming a place to enjoy. {There is talk of making a Golf Course!
